death.attack.suszombification.decomposin: %s decomposed to a small pile of rotten flesh
%1$s decomposed to a small pile of rotten flesh whilst fighting %2$s
death.attack.suszombification.ritual_sac: %s was the sacrifice in a suspicious ritual
%1$s got sacrificed in a suspicious ritual whilst fighting %2$s
death.attack.suszombification.spp_explos: %s blew himself up through improper nutrient consumption
%1$s blew himself up through improper nutrient consumption whilst fighting %2$s
message.suszombification.suspicious_pump: Tastes like a normal pumpkin pie... someone must have confused the recipes!
Sweet! Suddenly you feel so light... light as a feather in the wind...
So sugary! You're feeling tired and slow, trying to digest all these nutrients...
Brings back Christmas memories! But you get the feeling that some players might be watching you right now...
Sticks to your teeth! A warmth in your stomach makes you feel like you could go out and beat up everything!
Tastes watery, but that doesn't seem to bother you - you have a hunch that water isn't such a deadly element after all!
Refreshing, but also a bit sour - and you can't seem to feel the ground under your feet! Did they fall asleep?
Tastes a bit odd - and it seemed like your shadow suddenly disappeared... very strange...
A fresh and optimistic flavour - you're feeling like you're gonna dig up some ores beneath you in no time!
Tastes awful - no living creature would ever want to eat this! But maybe certain animals do like it...
Very sour, but you get the feeling that this flavor fits really well with other flavors - like the ones from potions...
That stench - disgusting! But you seem to get used to it quickly - unlike the poor creatures around you...
Very hard to chew, but after some time you feel like your whole body is getting softer and squishier - maybe you're gonna have an easier time resisting punches?
Tastes incredibly bad. Your body starts to feel weird, and you see flesh falling off...
A healthy and slightly metallic flavor that seems to accelerate your healing! Reminds you of past desert pyramid looting times...
You feel an eerie sensation coming from the ritual. A sense of relief washes over you and it seems fewer eyes than normal are focused on you - for now...
A mysterious outer force is making your body behave in odd ways...
Tastes very hot - suddenly you realize that this flavor doesn't just react explosive on your tongue, but also in the rest of your body...
message.suszombification.ritual.need_nig: The suspicious ritual looks like it does not work at this time of day.
message.suszombification.ritual.need_zom: The suspicious ritual seems to reject this mob.
message.suszombification.curse.warning: This sound makes you feel uneasy... perhaps you should stay clear of living beings for now.
